channel.title: meta on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in meta on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-24
item.description: A Meta prototype lets you build virtual worlds by describing them (3 minute read) Mark Zuckerberg recently showed off a prototype of an artificial intelligence system that lets people build parts of virtual worlds by verbally describing them.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-29
item.description: Apple offering engineers $180,000 bonuses to prevent poaching (2 minute read) The employee poaching war between Apple and Meta is heating up, with Apple now offering top engineering talents stock bonuses worth up to $180,000 to prevent them from defecting.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-17
item.description: Meta’s sci-fi haptic glove prototype lets you feel VR objects using air pockets (6 minute read) Meta has revealed a pair of haptic gloves that lets people feel objects in virtual reality.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-01
item.description: Facebook’s Meta watch has a camera notch, according to first leaked image (2 minute read) Leaked images of Facebook’s smartwatch show a camera notch that is clearly visible when the watch’s screen is off.
